summary: This bill, the "Withstanding Extreme Agricultural Threats by Harvesting Economic Resilience Act of 2025" or "WEATHER Act of 2025", amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act. It authorizes the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to research and develop a single index insurance policy to protect farmers against agricultural income losses due to extreme weather conditions. The bill defines covered crops, weather conditions, and policy features. It includes provisions for buy-up/buy-down options, priority features, and a report to Congress detailing the research and development outcomes.
